title: S&P 500 Hits Record as Gold and Silver Extend Rally | Closing Bell
description: Comprehensive cross-platform coverage of the U.S. market close on Bloomberg Television, Bloomberg Radio, and YouTube with Romaine Bostick, Emily Graffeo, and Tim Stenovec. (Source: Bloomberg)
